blighted_touch.name: Blighted Touch
blighted_touch.desc: Landing Basic Attacks during Sovereign State now applies Blightshock.

blightpierce.name: Blightpierce
blightpierce.desc: Your Blightshock attacks pierce through your enemies hyperarmor and gain more penetration.

anchor_shock.name: Anchor Shock
anchor_shock.desc: Your Blightshock prevents targets from using mobility mantras.

oath_blightsurger.name: Oath: Blightsurger
oath_blightsurger.desc:
Fists and storm. Wield sacred lightning, tear through foes and leave them withered.
[*Note; the requirements for this Oath is 80 additive Body (so 30 Strength, 20 Fortitude, and 30 Agility works!]
oath_blightsurger.reqs: oath_blightsurger := 80r STR OR 80r FTD OR 80r AGL, 40s LTN, 40s WND

sovereign_state.name: Sovereign State
sovereign_state.desc: Landing physical hits builds your Blight Meter. At full gauge, enter a Blight State that changes your critical and empowers Blightsurge abilities.
